solution_line_template: The builder purchased {num_boxes_bolts} boxes * {bolts_per_box} bolts = <<{num_boxes_bolts}*{bolts_per_box}={total_bolts_purchased}>>{total_bolts_purchased} bolts.
He used {total_bolts_purchased} bolts - {bolts_left_over} left over = <<{total_bolts_purchased}-{bolts_left_over}={bolts_used_for_project}>>{bolts_used_for_project} bolts for the project.
The builder purchased {num_boxes_nuts} boxes * {nuts_per_box} nuts = <<{num_boxes_nuts}*{nuts_per_box}={total_nuts_purchased}>>{total_nuts_purchased} nuts.
He used {total_nuts_purchased} nuts - {nuts_left_over} left over = <<{total_nuts_purchased}-{nuts_left_over}={nuts_used_for_project}>>{nuts_used_for_project} nuts for the project.

Total for the project he used {bolts_used_for_project} bolts + {nuts_used_for_project} nuts = <<{bolts_used_for_project}+{nuts_used_for_project}={total_used_for_project}>>{total_used_for_project} nuts and bolts.
